title: nidhichala sukama
sahitya:
nidhicAla sukhamA rAmuni sannidhi sEva sukhamA nijamuga balku
manasA 
(nidhicAla)

anupallavi

dadhi navanIta kSIramulu ruciyO dAsharathi dhyAna bhajana
sudhArasamu ruciyO 
(nidhicAla)

caraNam

dama shamamanu gangA snAnamu sukhamA kardama durviSaya kUpa
snAnamu sukhamA
mamata bandhana yuta narastuti sukhamA surapati tyAgarAja nutuni kIrtana
sukhamA 
(nidhicAla)
